hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Set the below parameters manually package_name="swift" published_version="3.1.1"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then available_version=$(sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi
export Workdir=`pwd` #Install prerequisites
sudo apt-get -y update sudo apt-get install -y autoconf libtool git cmake ninja-build python \ python-dev python3-dev uuid-dev libicu-dev \ icu-devtools libbsd-dev libedit-dev libxml2-dev \ libsqlite3-dev swig libpython-dev libncurses5-dev \ pkg-config libcurl4-openssl-dev tzdata
#Install Blocks runtime library: cd $Workdir git clone https://github.com/mackyle/blocksruntime cd blocksruntime ./buildlib sudo env prefix=/usr ./installlib cd ..
#Install Gold Linker echo `pwd` sudo apt-get install -y bison flex texinfo git clone git://sourceware.org/git/binutils-gdb.git cd binutils-gdb git checkout tags/binutils-2_27 ./configure --prefix=/opt/binutils-2.27 --enable-gold make sudo make install
export PATH=/opt/binutils-2.27/bin:$PATH cd ..
echo `pwd` #Building LLVM/clang cd $Workdir mkdir llvm && cd llvm git clone https://github.com/linux-on-ibm-z/llvm.git cd llvm git checkout llvm-for-swift-3.1 cd tools git clone https://github.com/linux-on-ibm-z/clang.git cd clang git checkout clang-for-swift-3.1 cd ../../projects git clone https://github.com/linux-on-ibm-z/compiler-rt.git cd compiler-rt git checkout compiler-rt-for-swift-3.1 cd ../..
echo `pwd` #Run cmake outside the source tree to configure LLVM
cd .. mkdir build
cd build cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/opt/llvm \ -DPYTHON_INCLUDE_DIR=/usr/include/python2.7 \ -DPYTHON_LIBRARY=/usr/lib/python2.7/config-s390x-linux-gnu/libpython2.7.so \ -DCURSES_INCLUDE_PATH=/usr/include \ -DCURSES_LIBRARY=/usr/lib/s390x-linux-gnu/libncurses.so \ -DCURSES_PANEL_LIBRARY=/usr/lib/s390x-linux-gnu/libpanel.so \ ../llvm
make -j4 make check # optional sudo make install # or "sudo make install" cd ../.. export PATH=/opt/llvm/bin:$PATH
#Building Swift echo `pwd` mkdir swift31 && cd swift31 git clone https://github.com/linux-on-ibm-z/swift.git cd swift git checkout swift-3.1.1-RELEASE-s390x ./utils/update-checkout --clone --scheme swift-3.1.1-RELEASE-s390x --config $PWD/utils/update-checkout-config-s390x.json rm -f ./utils/swift_build_support/__init__.pyc cd ../swift-corelibs-libdispatch git submodule init git submodule update --recursive cd ../swift
export MYDESTDIR=$HOME/swift/install
./utils/build-script -j 2 -r \ --lldb --foundation --xctest --llbuild --swiftpm --libdispatch -- \ --verbose-build=1 \ --install-swift --install-foundation --install-xctest --install-llbuild --install-swiftpm --install-libdispatch --install-lldb \ --swift-install-components='autolink-driver;compiler;clang-builtin-headers;stdlib;sdk-overlay;license' \ --build-swift-static-stdlib=1 \ --install-prefix=/usr \ --install-destdir=$MYDESTDIR
#To run the Swift compiler: export PATH=$MYDESTDIR/usr/bin:/opt/llvm/bin:/opt/binutils-2.26/bin:$PATH echo `pwd` echo 'print("Hello World")' > hello.swift swiftc -v hello.swift ./hello
#Running Test
#Run unit tests
./utils/build-script -j 2 -r -t 2>&1 | tee $Workdir/testunit
sed -n -e '/Failing Tests/,$p' $Workdir/testunit | sed -e '/Expected/,$d' | tee $Workdir/generated_failuresunit
echo "Failing Tests (7): Swift(linux-s390x) :: stdlib/Runtime.swift.gyb Swift(linux-s390x) :: stdlib/StringAPI.swift Swift(linux-s390x) :: stdlib/UnsafeRawBufferPointer.swift Swift(linux-s390x) :: Runtime/linux-fatal-backtrace.swift Swift(linux-s390x) :: Interpreter/enum_resilience.swift Swift(linux-s390x) :: stdlib/VarArgs.swift Swift(linux-s390x) :: IRGen/objc_simd.sil
" >$Workdir/expectedfailuresunit
diff -u --ignore-all-space -B <(sort $Workdir/expectedfailuresunit) <(sort $Workdir/generated_failuresunit) #Complete validation test suite
./utils/build-script -j 2 -r -T 2>&1 | tee $Workdir/testval sed -n -e '/Failing Tests/,$p' $Workdir/testval | sed -e '/Expected/,$d' | tee $Workdir/generated_failuresval
echo "Failing Tests (10): Swift(linux-s390x) :: IRGen/objc_simd.sil Swift(linux-s390x) :: stdlib/VarArgs.swift Swift(linux-s390x) :: Interpreter/enum_resilience.swift Swift(linux-s390x) :: Runtime/linux-fatal-backtrace.swift Swift(linux-s390x) :: stdlib/UnsafeRawBufferPointer.swift Swift(linux-s390x) :: stdlib/Runtime.swift.gyb Swift(linux-s390x) :: stdlib/StringAPI.swift Swift(linux-s390x) :: stdlib/SequenceType.swift.gyb Swift(linux-s390x) :: stdlib/String.swift Swift(linux-s390x) :: Evolution/test_enum_change_size.swift
">$Workdir/expectedfailuresval
diff -u --ignore-all-space -B <(sort $Workdir/expectedfailuresval) <(sort $Workdir/generated_failuresval) #To run tests in Foundation and Swift Package Manager ./utils/build-script -j 2 -r -t \ --lldb --xctest --foundation --llbuild --swiftpm --libdispatch -- \ --verbose-build=1 \ --swift-install-components='autolink-driver;compiler;clang-builtin-headers;stdlib;sdk-overlay;license' \ --build-swift-static-stdlib=1 \ --install-prefix=/usr \ --skip-test-cmark --skip-test-swift --skip-test-lldb --skip-test-llbuild --skip-test-xctest --skip-test-libdispatch 2>&1 | tee $Workdir/testmang
grep "failed" $Workdir/testmang >> $Workdir/testmangfailed sed 's/failed.*/failed/' $Workdir/testmangfailed 2>&1 | tee $Workdir/testmangfailed1
echo "TestFoundation/TestNSString.swift:420: error: TestNSString.test_swiftStringUTF16 : XCTAssertTrue failed Test Case 'TestNSString.test_swiftStringUTF16' failed Test Suite 'TestNSString' failed TestFoundation/TestNSTimeZone.swift:166: error: TestNSTimeZone.test_initializingTimeZoneWithAbbreviation : XCTAssertEqual failed Test Case 'TestNSTimeZone.test_initializingTimeZoneWithAbbreviation' failed Test Suite 'TestNSTimeZone' failed Test Suite 'TestFoundation.xctest' failed Test Suite 'All tests' failed ">$Workdir/expectedfailuremang
diff -u --ignore-all-space -B <(sort $Workdir/expectedfailuremang) <(sort $Workdir/testmangfailed1)
